Title: Search by Title - Enter valid title - Display matching books with pagination

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is on the library search interface. The system has a functional search bar accepting text input for Book Titles. At least one book exists in the database with a valid title.
1. Enter a valid Book Title (e.g., "The Great Gatsby") into the search bar.
Expected Result: 1. The system displays all books matching the entered title.

Action: 2. Click the "Search" button or press Enter.
Expected Result: 2. Results are paginated (max 20 items per page if total exceeds 20).

Action:
Cleanup:
Clear search input and verify no residual results.

Title: Verify Cart Limit - Add 10 items - Block 11th item with error

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is logged in and has a cart. The system enforces a cart limit of 10 items. At least 10 books are available for addition to the cart.
1. Add 10 books to the cart.
Expected Result: 1. The system allows the first 10 items to be added.

Action: 2. Attempt to add an 11th book to the cart.
Expected Result: 2. The 11th item is blocked with an error message: "Cart limit reached (max 10 items)."

Action:
Cleanup:
Remove all items from the cart.
